name: Patchwork Kingdom #902 | Rizeala
description: Rizeala is a rare instance of an entire kingdom where all of the 227 schools are connected to the internet (and 27 schools with unavailable data as clouds and birds in the sky), representing the end goal of UNICEF's Giga Project | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
